title: Disaster during New Ultra Rapid Fire upload!

replies.body: Riot is trolling once again. The energy drink will make the 'nurf' mode faster, and the same as the old URF mode. Nice try Rito
is that what happened last year?
No, last year they announced "the future of League of Legends" (URF) as an April Fools joke, even getting pros' opinions on it, and then trolled us by actually releasing it as a game mode.
It is like waiting for Christmas :D
it is also like waiting for school to end
Mine already ended just today ;)
Same here but the day went so slow and i was restless all day just wating to get home and play urf.
i agree
HOP ABOARD THE URF HYPE TRAIIIIIN!

Ah, that's unfortunate.

...

Energy drink
URF

Oh, am I being trolled again?
Rito pls.
***~~~#URFNOTNURF~~~***
**#NURFNOTURF**
Man thanx riot {{item:3073}}  I just played URF it was awesome

I wish nurf was actually coming out, i think it would have been fun, just think of tanks such as mundo, the hp regen isn't nerfed so they would be op + their % hp damage instead of normal damage. They wouldn't be affected as much and cause an enjoyable game.
I'm excited about what the future will bring and I think the best is yet to come.
THANK U ITS SO FUN{{summoner:31}}
Im guessing this is an april fools joke?
The 100% + mana cost and such was an april fools joke
Rito why'd you reduce the movespeed and attack speed. Rumours are people say that new URF is gonna suck! :( Thanks anyway for bringing it back, it was so much fun before!

it was an April fools joke. I hate having to wait for American time to reach April Fools because i imagine it is released at the same time everywhere. The american time is really why we have to wait til 4pm.
{{champion:44}} truly outrageous
Na 'Nurf' is just a rumour it isn't actually coming out.
i did not get the chance to play last night {{item:3070}} but all this afternoon im playin U.R.F baby
when i  save the banner at the top of this page it said nurf banner

Urf mode is totally awesome... Shyvana with perma-burnout is OP. Also, the fact that she can spam Q and AA's means perma-dragon, and also due to her mark, she can pretty much nuke anyone from full to zero in a matter of tasty chomp-sized snacks
By the time i get on lol i think its gone :(. How long is it up for again ?
btw how long is it going to last?
{{champion:96}} vomit everywhere... missiles everywhere
The Robots have taken me. Please send help.
why u do dis rito
Don't mess with the {{champion:12}}
1 More minute :D
not here :C
YAYAYAYAY
ITS 4:00
where is it D;
w8 4 dem
its 4 PM!!!
almost¡¡¡{{summoner:31}}
2 MINUTES
oooooooooo nine mins until N.U.R.F
So..... that means 6pm NZ??
Such a joke..
rito i waited for this urf to come and its comming at 4?! pls rito april fools servers
So is URF going to be released at 4?
